Returns.Summary: Index of the screen that contains the position provided.
Index of the screen that contains the bounds provided.

Parameter.Name: labelPointer
Parameter.Summary: Pointer to a string that was created with <see cref="InternalHelper.AllocateString(string?, IList{Action})"/>

Returns.Summary: Pointer to a string that was created with <see cref="InternalHelper.AllocateString(string?, IList{Action})"/>

Parameter.Name: width
Parameter.Summary: Width of the label. Needs to be a reference since the FLTK library modifies the value.

Parameter.Name: height
Parameter.Summary: Height of the label. Needs to be a reference since the FLTK library modifies the value.

Returns.Summary: It's a pointer to *something*. <c>cfl_macros.h</c> says <c>const void *</c>
Pointer to the parent widget. Will be <see cref="IntPtr.Zero"/> (NULL) when there is no parent.

Function.Name: find
Function.Summary: Find the index of a widget in this group

Parameter.Name: widget
Parameter.Summary: Pointer to the widget to find the index of

Returns.Summary: Index of the child widget. When value is equal to the amount of widgets, then it wasn't found.

Function.Name: add
Function.Summary: Add a widget to this group

Parameter.Name: widget
Parameter.Summary: Pointer to the widget to add as a child

Function.Name: insert
Function.Summary: Insert the provided widget into this group at a specific index.

Parameter.Name: widget
Parameter.Summary: Pointer to the widget to add as a child

Parameter.Name: index
Parameter.Summary: Index to insert the provided widget.

Function.Name: remove
Function.Summary: Remove a widget from the group provided.

Parameter.Name: widget
Parameter.Summary: Pointer to the widget to remove from this group

Function.Name: remove_by_index
Function.Summary: Remove a widget (by the index) from the group provided.

Parameter.Name: widgetIndex
Parameter.Summary: Index of the widget to remove

Function.Name: clear
Function.Summary: Remove all child widgets from this group

Function.Name: children
Function.Summary: Get the amount of child widgets for this group

Returns.Summary: <para>Will be NULL (<see cref="IntPtr.Zero"/>) when not found</para>
Will return null pointer (<see cref="IntPtr.Zero"/>) when there is no current group.
Non-zero value when should be treated as <see langword="true"/>

Parameter.Name: args
Parameter.Summary: Generate pointer with <see cref="InternalHelper.AllocateString(string[], IList{Action}, bool)"/> where the parameter <c>globalAllocate</c> is set to <see langword="false"/> since this is a <c>char**</c> and not a <c>const char**</c>.

Returns.Summary: Will be <see cref="IntPtr.Zero"/> when no image (NULL)
Raw window handle for the operating system/window server.

Function.Name: region
Function.Summary: Get the window region. Will only work on X11

Function.Name: set_region
Function.Summary: Set the window region. Will only work on X11
